Persis William-Mensah (amụrụ na 15 na onwa isii, na afọ 1996) bụ onye Ghana na-eme egwuregwu. O sonyere na asọmpi 4 × 100 mita nke ụmụ nwanyị na afọ 2019 World Athletics Championships. N'afọ 2019, ọ nọchitekwara anya Ghana na 2019 African Games nke e mere na Rabat, Morocco. O meriri na 100 mita ụmụ nwanyị.
